stories.text:
I saw this question being asked earlier on Twitter -

can we take just allocate $1B out of the $40B fund we planned on sending help Ukraine to create a nationwide security plan to put a trained armed security personnel at every public school in the US?
stories.title: Ask HN: Can the gov use $1B to put armed security at every public school in US?
The Fake World of Ted and Pop Psychology

stories.text:
Strava doesn't provide a way for getting webhooks from your activities, so I wrote up a little application to do just that.

Using:

- Tailwind

- Sveltekit

- Netlify

- Firebase/Firestore

Check it out and let me know what you think. I don't have any expectations that Strava won't break it or keep me at the 1000 requests/day quota, but hey it was fun to make!
stories.title: Show HN: Webhooks for Strava
Great Wall Motors Is Launching a Hydrogen-Only, Luxury Brand
